CustomField.formula: IF( (RecordType.Name == 'NCMT DES Item Master O&P'|| RecordType.Name == 'NCMT DES Item Uniformat O&P') || (Material_Unit_Cost__c + Equipment_Rental_Day__c + Hourly_Rate__c == 0), In_house_Unit_Total_Adj__c, Total_Material_Cost_w_Sales_Tax__c + Total_Equipment_Cost_w_Sales_Tax__c + Total_Labor_Premium__c )
CustomField.label: Total Direct Cost
